webinars.title: Single-Cell Omics Computational and Experimental Workshop
webinars.organizer: Human Cell Atlas, Mahidol University, Thailand
webinars.description: Participated in an intensive workshop on single-cell omics technologies and analysis methods. The workshop covered experimental design, data processing, quality control, normalization, dimensionality reduction, clustering, and trajectory inference for single-cell RNA-seq data.

webinars.title: In Silico Drug Discovery Workshop
webinars.description: Comprehensive workshop on computational approaches to drug discovery, covering virtual screening, molecular docking, pharmacophore modeling, and structure-based drug design techniques. The workshop provided hands-on experience with industry-standard tools and best practices for in silico drug discovery pipelines.

webinars.title: NAN Virtual NMR Metabolomics Workshop
webinars.organizer: University of Georgia Complex Carbohydrate Research Center
webinars.description: Specialized workshop on NMR-based metabolomics, covering experimental design, sample preparation, data acquisition, processing, and analysis of metabolomic data. The workshop included practical sessions on metabolite identification and quantification using advanced NMR techniques.

webinars.title: Curious2024 – Future Insight™
webinars.description: Attended this forward-looking conference that explored emerging trends and technologies in healthcare, life sciences, and materials science. The conference featured presentations from leading experts on topics such as AI in drug discovery, precision medicine, and next-generation therapeutics.

webinars.title: Mini-Fellowship Program on Molecular Imaging
webinars.description: Participated in this specialized fellowship program focused on advanced molecular imaging techniques and their applications in biomedical research and clinical practice. The program covered various imaging modalities, image analysis methods, and their integration with other omics data.

webinars.title: CompBio-2023
webinars.description: Attended this comprehensive computational biology workshop that covered a wide range of topics including genomics, proteomics, structural biology, and systems biology. The workshop included hands-on sessions on cutting-edge computational methods and tools used in biological research.

webinars.title: Online International Workshop on 'Generative AI in Bioinformatics'
webinars.description: Participated in this cutting-edge workshop exploring the applications of generative AI models in bioinformatics. The workshop covered topics such as protein structure prediction, drug design, and genomic sequence analysis using generative models like diffusion models and GANs.

webinars.title: 7th International Symposium on Bioinformatics 2023
webinars.description: Attended this international symposium that brought together researchers and practitioners in bioinformatics from across the Asia-Pacific region. The symposium featured presentations on the latest advances in bioinformatics methods, tools, and applications in various domains of life sciences.

webinars.title: 2nd Asian Student Council Symposium
webinars.organizer: ISCB - International Society for Computational Biology
webinars.description: Participated in this student-focused symposium organized by the International Society for Computational Biology. The symposium provided a platform for students and early-career researchers to present their work, network with peers, and learn from established researchers in the field of computational biology.

webinars.title: Certificate Course on 'Introduction to Data and Data Science'
webinars.description: Completed this comprehensive course on the fundamentals of data science, covering topics such as data collection, cleaning, analysis, visualization, and interpretation. The course provided a solid foundation in statistical methods and programming tools commonly used in data science projects.

webinars.title: Machine Learning for Biomarkers and Drug Discovery
webinars.organizer: National Institute of Technology, Durgapur, India
webinars.description: Attended this specialized workshop on the application of machine learning techniques in biomarker identification and drug discovery. The workshop covered various ML algorithms and their implementation in identifying potential biomarkers and drug candidates from large biological datasets.

webinars.title: Computational Biology and Biomedical Informatics
webinars.organizer: National Institute of Technology, Silchar, India
webinars.description: Participated in this comprehensive workshop that bridged computational biology and biomedical informatics. The workshop covered topics such as biological data analysis, modeling of biological systems, and the application of informatics approaches in biomedical research and healthcare.

webinars.title: Computational Structure-Based Screening and Molecular Dynamics
webinars.description: Attended this hands-on workshop on computational methods for structure-based drug screening and molecular dynamics simulations. The workshop provided practical training on using Schrödinger software suite for virtual screening, docking, and MD simulations in drug discovery projects.

webinars.title: Virtual Seminar on 'Molecular Perspective SARS-CoV-2, Drug Targets, Drug Designing and Research'
webinars.description: Participated in this timely seminar that focused on the molecular aspects of SARS-CoV-2, potential drug targets, and approaches to designing effective therapeutics. The seminar provided insights into ongoing research efforts and computational strategies for COVID-19 drug discovery.

webinars.title: Cloud Workshop: 'Structure-Based Screening & Molecular Dynamics'
webinars.description: Attended this cloud-based workshop on structure-based screening and molecular dynamics simulations. The workshop demonstrated how cloud computing resources can be leveraged for computationally intensive tasks in drug discovery, providing hands-on experience with cloud-based workflows.

webinars.title: Workshop: 'HPC & AI in Computational Biology'
webinars.description: Participated in this advanced workshop on high-performance computing and artificial intelligence applications in computational biology. The workshop covered topics such as parallel computing, GPU acceleration, and AI algorithms for analyzing large biological datasets.

webinars.title: Summer School: 'Machine Learning in Bioinformatics'
webinars.description: Attended this intensive summer school program focused on the application of machine learning techniques in bioinformatics. The program covered various ML algorithms and their implementation in solving complex biological problems, with hands-on projects and case studies.

webinars.title: Webinar: 'Telomerase as Cardiovascular Therapeutic Target'
webinars.description: Participated in this specialized webinar that explored the potential of telomerase as a therapeutic target for cardiovascular diseases. The webinar covered the molecular mechanisms of telomerase action, its role in cardiovascular pathology, and strategies for targeting it therapeutically.

webinars.title: E-Workshop on Bioinformatics
webinars.description: Attended this comprehensive workshop on bioinformatics that covered various aspects of biological data analysis, including sequence analysis, structural bioinformatics, and systems biology. The workshop provided hands-on training with commonly used bioinformatics tools and databases.

webinars.title: Workshop on 'Immunoinformatics'
webinars.description: Participated in this specialized workshop on immunoinformatics, focusing on computational approaches to studying immune systems. The workshop covered topics such as epitope prediction, immunogenicity analysis, and vaccine design using computational methods and tools.
